about_the_game:
You were Kidnapped by a crazy serial-killer in the middle of nowhere, can you find your way out?
through the escape the player will Learn and see the terrifying facts about the unknown killer and will Find himself deeper and deeper into the trap...
The Killer's Goal is to prepare the stove and find you to use it.



Use Your Surroundings To Your Advantage And Focus On Escaping The Horrifying Woods Of Oregon, The Player Can Use Fire, Noise, Distractions And More
In Order To Escape.

SURVIVE, AVOID, ESCAPE.

When Escaping The Terrifying Settings The Player Will Have To Use Essentials And Tools Like Keys, Batteries, Explosives And More In Order To
Break Out Of The House And Escape The Woods.
In Order To See through the darkness the player will use a limited flashlight, through the Nights the flashlight will reveal it's Horrifying weakness.
Around The Map The Player Will Find Secret Rooms, Clues, Remains Of Other Survivors And More...
The Player Will Have To Find a Way To Activate The Local Radio Tower In Order To Send An Emergency Signal To The State Police And Escape.

Important Disclaimer:

This Game Is In Early Stages And Will Be Getting Huge Updates In The Future, Although This Is The Official Release, Expect Big Releases In The Future.
We Have Big Plans And We Will Be Able To Achieve Them Only With The Community's Help.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game Contains Blood And Gore Visuals

through the escape the player will Learn and see the terrifying facts about the unknown killer and will Find himself deeper and deeper into the trap...

name: My Last Night Here

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD R9 270X
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K or AMD R5 1600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD RX 580
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible
